PARAGRAPH.STRING: is a fourteen thousand foot peak in the San Juan Mountains of the U.S. state of Colorado.
is located in the La Garita Wilderness (part of the Rio Grande National Forest) in Saguache County approximately 10 miles (16 km) north of Creede.
is situated rather far to the east of the other fourteeners in the San Juans, and
has more of a wilderness setting than many other fourteeners.
is a relatively straightforward climb, with two hiking routes to the summit, the South Ridge and the East Flank.
